description:
Take your squat, deadlife and box jump to the next level. These 7/8 tights are made with Chakara® compression fabric to help you power through your workout. Flatlock seaming sides comfortably next to your skin and UPF50+ sun protection keeps you covered when you take your training outside.Made of compression stretch jersey nylon and LYCRA® with a soft feel.UPF 50+ fabric keeps you protected.High waist with wide waistband provides coverage and has a hidden key pocket.Power mesh inset panels in waist gives maximum support.Breathable Coolmax crotch gusset adds comfort.Flatlocked construction resists chafing.

        Sustainability








Bluesign











                      Certified Bluesign® Product
name: Prana Transform 7/8 Leggings - Women's
